creator: Tubbgames
descriptionHtml:
TEEN PATTI IS THE MOST POPULAR Card GAME IN INDIA, MILLIONS PLAYING EVERYDAY & Tubb Teen Patti is where they play.

Why should you download this app?

♥ Play new Teen Patti Game Variations with real players. 
♥ Lowest Data usage & battery consumption 
♥ Daily Bonus Free Chips : Get 25 Lakh Free Teen Patti chips on download 
♥ Get 1 Million teenpatti chips as referral bonus
♥ Sidepunch (forced sideshow)
♥ New Chat options: Private chat & Group Chat
♥ Join a table quickly – zero wait time & also switch tables between games 
♥ Exclusive Emoticons: Tubojis

Tubb Games brings you the best Teen Patti App.

You can call it Flush,Teen Patti, Tin Patti, 3 Patti, Teen Pathi (in South India) or 3 Pati. What matters is that with this app you will experience a faster, more exciting Teen Patti game! Tubb Online Games Private Limited brings you the best Teen Patti Game app. Better as compared to other Tin Patti apps, the game play experience of this app will beat all other apps of 3 pati. Apart from this Tubb offers exclusive 3 Pati variations.

Download the Teen Patti game now & join the Teen Patti Club.

3 Patti game, also called as Indian Poker, is easier to play now as Tubb offers it in your most private space -- your mobile phone. Your gaming area, however, is boundless. Involve anyone you like – from family and friends to millions of Teenpatti lovers across the globe.

This app’s brilliant design interface engages you with its realistic dealer and tables. Come to the table anytime to find your daily bonus chips. Use your 3 patti skills to win more chips using this daily bonus. 

Tubb brings you the best features that are available. So download the Teen Patti Game now.  

Exciting?! But this 3patti new online game involves no real money or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social gaming does not imply future success at real money gambling/3 patti game.  

How to play 3 Patti: 

The player with the highest card wins. Following is the ranking for cards from high to low for tin patti.  

1. Trail or Set (three of same rank)
 2. Pure Sequence (straight flush or run) 
3. Sequence (straight or normal run) 
4. Color (flush)
 5. Pair (two cards of same rank) 
6. High Card  

Tin Patti classic: 

  Limit (Play Now) 
Player with the highest hand wins the game, once the pot limit is reached.

No Limit
 Player with the highest hand wins the game, here you have an opportunity to win unlimited 3 Pati chips 

Tin Patti variations – Available only in this game:

  Dealer dolly 
In this version, the player would be dealt 2 cards, he needs to match with other 3 cards dealer places on the table. Player with the highest 3 card rank wins the game.  

Triplet
 In this 3 pati variation, all the players would be dealt 3 cards. Three cards would be triplet hand ranking. Player with highest triplet wins the game.  

Super Blind 
All the players would be dealt three cards. Player can see only two cards. After the show is placed, player with the highest hand ranking wins the game.
 Note: Player can only see the blind folded card after the show is placed.  

Feature available only in Tubb 3 patti game: 

Sidepunch: This feature is a forced side show feature which can be availed only once per game. All the users will be given 4 sidepunch by default & 1 sidepunch as daily bonus

Reach us:  

To report any issues with usage or just to share feedback and tell us how we can improve, write to support@tubbgames.com

  Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tubbgames/  

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/tubbgames  

Subscribe to our channel on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxknTVTiO_plyilyKoxrtkQ

Exciting?! But this 3patti new online game involves no real money or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social gaming does not imply future success at real money gambling/3 patti game.  

How to play 3 Patti: 

The player with the highest card wins. Following is the ranking for cards from high to low for tin patti.  

1. Trail or Set (three of same rank)
 2. Pure Sequence (straight flush or run) 
3. Sequence (straight or normal run) 
4. Color (flush)
 5. Pair (two cards of same rank) 
6. High Card  

Tin Patti classic: 

  Limit (Play Now) 
Player with the highest hand wins the game, once the pot limit is reached.

No Limit
 Player with the highest hand wins the game, here you have an opportunity to win unlimited 3 Pati chips 

Tin Patti variations – Available only in this game:

  Dealer dolly 
In this version, the player would be dealt 2 cards, he needs to match with other 3 cards dealer places on the table. Player with the highest 3 card rank wins the game.  

Triplet
 In this 3 pati variation, all the players would be dealt 3 cards. Three cards would be triplet hand ranking. Player with highest triplet wins the game.  

Super Blind 
All the players would be dealt three cards. Player can see only two cards. After the show is placed, player with the highest hand ranking wins the game.
 Note: Player can only see the blind folded card after the show is placed.  

Feature available only in Tubb 3 patti game: 

Sidepunch: This feature is a forced side show feature which can be availed only once per game. All the users will be given 4 sidepunch by default & 1 sidepunch as daily bonus

title: Tubb Teen Patti - Indian Poker - TTP

creator: Tubbgames
descriptionHtml:
TEEN PATTI IS THE MOST POPULAR Card GAME IN INDIA, MILLIONS PLAYING EVERYDAY & Tubb Teen Patti is where they play.

Why should you download this app?

♥ Play new Teen Patti Game Variations (Muflis, Hukum, Joker, Super Blind, Triplet) with real players. 
♥ Play Andar Bahar, Mini Poker, Card War & Millionaire Blind.
♥ Lowest Data usage & battery consumption 
♥ Daily Bonus Free Chips : Get 5 Lakh Free Teen Patti chips on download 
♥ Get 1 Million teenpatti chips as referral bonus
♥ New Chat options: Private chat & Group Chat
♥ Join a table quickly – zero wait time & also switch tables between games 
♥ Exclusive Emoticons: Tubojis
♥ Watch Mode : If you don’t have enough chips/ don’t want to play the current round, you can just watch other players
 ♥ Stand up Mode : If you don’t want to play the current round that has started, you can just watch other players

Tubb Games brings you the Teen Patti App with exiting variations of 3 paati along with Andar Bahar, Mini Poker & Millionaire blind.

 You can call it Flush,Teen Patti, Tin Patti, 3 Patti, Teen Pathi or 3 Pati. With this app you will experience faster, more exciting Teen Patti game! Tubb brings you the Teen Patti Game app with Andar Bahar , Mini Poker & Millionaire Blind. Better as compared to other Tin Patti apps, the experience of this app will beat all other apps of 3 pati. Apart from this Tubb offers exclusive 3 Pati variations. 

Download the Teen Patti game now & join the Teen Patti Club.  This app’s brilliant design interface brings to you, realistic dealer and tables. You can choose from a range of dealers & also switch the dealers within an ongoing game.   Exciting?! But this 3 patti new online game involves no real money or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social gaming does not imply future success at real money gambling/3 patti game. 

How to Play Andar Bahar:

The dealer places a card face up and the player has to bet on one of the two piles: Andar (inside) or Bahar (outside). The dealer then deals cards alternately to the two piles until a card appears that matches the initial card. The side where this matching card appears wins.

How to play 3 Patti: 

The player with the highest card wins. Following is the ranking for cards from high to low for tin patti.  

1. Trail or Set (three of same rank)
 2. Pure Sequence (straight flush or run) 
3. Sequence (straight or normal run) 
4. Color (flush)
 5. Pair (two cards of same rank) 
6. High Card  

3 Patti game modes: 

  Classic 
Player with the highest hand wins the game, once the pot limit is reached.

Muflis
In this 3 patti variation, instead of the highest card the lowest card wins

Hukum
In this 3 patti version, a card of any value will be declared a joker at the start, if the player has that card then it can be treated as a joker

Joker 
In this version, 3 cards are dealt & one of them is a joker

Tin Patti variations – Available only in this game:

  Mini Poker 
In this version, the player would be dealt 2 cards, he needs to match with other 3 cards dealer places on the table. Player with the highest 3 card rank wins the game.  

Triplet
 In this 3 pati variation, all the players would be dealt 3 cards. Three cards would be triplet hand ranking. Player with highest triplet wins the game.  

Super Blind 
All the players would be dealt three cards. Player can see only two cards. After the show is placed, player with the highest hand ranking wins the game.
 Note: Player can only see the blind folded card after the show is placed.  


Reach us:  

To report any issues with usage or just to share feedback and tell us how we can improve, write to support@tubbgames.com

  Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tubbgames/  

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/tubbgames  

Subscribe to our channel on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxknTVTiO_plyilyKoxrtkQ
descriptionShort: Teen patti online game with 3 patti variations & andar bahar. Get 5 lakh chips.
